Chinese.Description: 角矛发射后会追踪一点时间后快速射出，并且获得更快的发射速度和更远的攻击范围，攻击到目标或墙的情况会发生一次无伤害的爆炸

English.Description: After king vulture's tusk being launched, it tracks the target for a short time before speeding up rapidly, resulting in increased firing speed and extended attack range. Upon hitting a target or wall, it causes a non-damaging explosion.
